attributes.action: Badges required to park in adult and children bays.
attributes.additional_details: Because currently anyone parks in the spaces without consequences and there are very few as it is so majority of the time I am unable to park there and can see people get out of their car with no children and I have to park in a normal space where I’m unable to get my baby out safely with enough room.
attributes.background: I believe parents should be giving a badge to park in adult and children bays to stop people without children parking in them to free more spaces for people with children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602769
